name: The Rock (bnn678)
description: Open the game https://scratch.mit.edu/ and go on the adventure full of loyalty, friendship, epicness, and jealousy! When you open the game, all you have to do is click the green flag in the top right corner to begin the adventure. The game is an interactive adventure so there is a mix of narrative scenes and interactive gameplay. There are times when you will direct a character using WASD and times when you interact with the map by clicking buttons or clicking on the map. Or, if you don't want to download the game, you can go to this link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/122564870/ and just click the green flag on screen. You may want to make the game fullscreen by clicking the icon in the top left of the screen.
